entry.def: A Christian is someone who follows the teachings of Jesus Christ.

example.ex: Last week there were clashes during protests by Christians and Muslims.
example.tran: 上周在基督徒和伊斯兰教徒举行的抗议活动中发生了冲突。

entry.def: Christian means relating to Christianity or Christians.

means.word_mean: 1. following the teachings or manifesting the qualities or spirit of Jesus Christ

Sentence.sentence: We think this is the way the future is going to work," said Kyle Dickson, co-director of research and the mobile learning initiative at Abilene Christian University in Texas, which has bought more than 600 iPhones and 300 iPods for students Although plenty of students take their laptops to class, they don't take them everywhere and would prefer something lighter

Abilene Christian settled on the devices after surveying students and finding that they did not like hauling around their laptops, but that most of them always carried a cell phone, Dr. Dickson said. Dickson said.

At least four institutions - the University of Maryland, Oklahoma Christian University, Abilene Christian and Freed-Hardeman- have announced that they will give the devices to some or all of their students this fall.

jushi.english: Jesus is believed by Christians to have been divine.
jushi.chinese: 基督教徒们相信耶稣是神。

jushi.english: Do you agree with such Christian ideas?
jushi.chinese: 你赞同这类基督教的观点吗?
